text: Excellent and meticulous lawyers. Could not have imagined going through the ordeal that I had without the experience and guidance of both Remy and John. Would recommend the firm's services to anyone looking for skilled yet empathetic lawyers willing to guide you at every step of the way

In my consultations with RCL Chambers, I was impressed by the team’s sound guidance and professionalism. In particular, Joint MD John Lo's extensive litigation experience and meticulous attention to detail shone through; his advice was precise and easy to understand. Definitely a team I would confidently engage to support my legal endeavours. Thank you for your hard work and exceptional service.

When looking for lawyers, the top few criteria (at least for me) include:
1.	Expertise and experience: the ability to break down difficult concepts into information that man-on-the-street can understand. It’s always a plus point if they could illustrate similar situations that they have encountered.

2.	Responsiveness: The last thing I would want when dealing with matters of the law would be to have to struggle with timely responses.

3.	Cost and Value: ‘Nuff said.

I’ve had quite a fair bit of dealings with the team when my family and I had separate personal matters to deal with. I think it’s fair for me to say that the team had been professional and have more than exceeded the expectations based on the above 3 criteria.

Not every lawyer places emphasis on the well-being of the client and have high EQ to manage already stressed out clients/prospects – this firm does that well.
Remy and his team are awesome. Felt comfortable and assured throughout. Good outcomes for both cases! Highly recommended!
Professional communication in both Chinese and English, providing patient and clear explanations. Professional services advice given.
